name: Carousel - Scrolling grid buttons
descr: Turn radio and check-boxes in single/multi-choice grid-questions  into clickable buttons, displaying one by one row, in a scrolling area

props.name: Number of buttons per row
props.descr: The number of buttons per row

props.name: Number of special buttons
props.descr: The number of special buttons (like none of these)

props.name: Hide button text
props.descr: Defines if the button text should be hidden

props.name: Minimum width of buttons
props.descr: Defines if the minimum width of a button

props.name: Maximum width of buttons
props.descr: Defines if the maximum width of a button

props.name: Minimum height
props.descr: Defines if the minimum height of a button

props.name: Maximum height
props.descr: Defines if the maximum height of a button

props.name: Minimum width of scroll area
props.descr: Defines if the minimum width of the scroll area (containing the grid row text)

props.name: Maximum width of scroll area
props.descr: Defines if the maximum width of the scroll area (containing the grid row text)

props.name: Use images as background
props.descr: Defines if the button should use images as background

props.name: Autosize images
props.descr: Defines if the button should autosize images

props.name: Auto next
props.descr: Automatically go next on single selection

props.name: Randomize columns
props.descr: Randomize columns from the grid (buttons in random order)

props.name: Randomseed
props.descr: Random seed to be used in order to create the same radmom order in different questions

props.name: Exclude columns from the start
props.descr: Exclude columns from the start (like 'None of these')

props.name: Exclude columns from the end
props.descr: Exclude columns from the end (like 'None of these')
